paper_abstract: The Randic index R of a simple graph G is defined as R(G) = Sigma(vi similar to vj) 1/root delta(i)delta(j), where delta(i) denotes the degree of the vertex v(i). In this paper we obtain closed formulae for the Randic index of Sierpinski-type polymeric networks.
paper_title: On the Randic Index of Polymeric Networks Modelled by Generalized Sierpinski Graphs
